name: Gunmetal theme
author: blueteafrog
description: Gunmetal Theme was designed for long screen times and reading comfort. It features a dark theme and a light theme.

themes.name: Gunmetal Theme - Dark
themes.description: Colorful tags, colorful standout admonitions with a rich blueish dark grey base for comfortable viewing

themes.name: Gunmetal Theme - Light
themes.description: Colorful tags, colorful standout admonitions with a rich blueish dark grey sidebar for a comfortable focus on the main content.
